name: BizSpeed
overview:
BizSpeed is an enterprise software and services company focused on extending business applications to mobile, wireless and web users. BizSpeed solutions provide and collect information at the point of need to help achieve a â€œfaster businessâ€.

BizSpeed’s mobile software (goRoam) is available on a Software as a Service (SaaS) basis or on-site installation. goRoam is a multi-tenant application with connectors for ERP systems such as SAP or custom applications via XML web services or FTP.

All goRoam modules support Proof of Delivery, electronic signature capture, barcode scanning, wireless dispatch, store and forward message queuing, mobile printing and auto-emailing of mobile forms such as customer receipts.

goRoam has modules for:

  • Pickup and Delivery (route accounting, DSD)
  • Bulk product delivery - fuels, lubricants, chemicals and hazmat products
  • Mobile forms - inspections and surveys
  • Field Service - work orders
  • Asset tracking
